annotation: <data-piece><history><entry><input>sudo nano /etc/netplan/01-netcfg.yaml</input><output></output><annotation>Edit the netplan configuration file to set a static IP address.</annotation><annotation></annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo netplan apply</input><output></output><annotation>Apply the network configuration changes.</annotation><annotation></annotation></entry><entry><input>ip a</input><output>inet 192.168.1.100/24 brd 192.168.1.255 scope global eth0</output><annotation>Verify that the static IP has been applied.</annotation><annotation></annotation></entry></history><current-entry><entry><input>exit</input><output>exit</output><annotation>End the session after configuring the IP address.</annotation><annotation></annotation></entry></current-entry></data-piece>
